        public void model()
        Generate the logistic regression model
        参数:

      • coefLR10

        private boolean coefLR10(java.lang.String coeff,
               java.lang.String max,
               java.lang.String online)
        Obtain the coefficient of logistic regression
        参数:
        coeff - Coefficients file
        max - MaxScore file
        online - OnlineWeight file
        返回:
        True for success and false for failure

        online - OnlineWeight file
        返回:
